api_list.name: Instrument Type
api_list.description:
Type	Meaning
CB	Corporate Bond eg. HDFC, SBI
SGB	Sovergein Gold Bond
GS	Government Securities
Tbill	Treasury Bills
MF	Mutual Funds
ETF	Exchange Traded Funds

required_parameters.name: type
required_parameters.description: Enter Value: CB, SGB, GS, Tbill, MF, ETF
